description.narrative: Tools and evidence are generated and used for effective regional multicountry coordination and harmonized support to country offices, which contributes to Cross-Sectoral Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Cross-Sectoral Planning And Programme Reviews, Cross-Sectoral Planning And Programme Reviews (Covid), Disaster Risk Reduction, Disaster Risk Reduction (Covid), Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, United Nations Working Together. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: ESAR Country Offices achieve Programming Excellence (programmes are gender and equity focused, respond to humanitarian and development contexts, deliver and demonstrate results) by 2021

sector.narrative: Humanitarian planning and review activities (HRP, RRP, UNICEF HAC)
Risk informed Programming for resilience (including policy and strategy development)
Risk management and resilience/research/evaluation evidence generation, synthesis, and use

title.narrative: UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace
Eastern and Southern Africa Regional Evaluation Reports
UNICEF Tender Notices through the UN Global Marketplace

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Tools and evidence are generated and used for effective regional multicountry coordination and harmonized support to country offices

description.narrative: In 2019, HARP significantly contributed to, and engaged in, global and regional policies and initiatives, and effectively participated in both internal and inter-agency coordination mechanisms resulting in child focused perspectives remaining at the core of the humanitarian dialogue and included as key priorities. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:09/02/2020

title.narrative: Percentage of regional inter-agency preparedness and response initiatives that prioritize the needs and rights of children.
